actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

official_title: To amend the Act commonly referred to as the "Johnson Act" to limit the authority of States to regulate gambling devices on vessels.

summary.text: Amends the Johnson Act to provide that States may not regulate the possession or use of gambling equipment on vessels whose voyage consists of a segment: (1) that begins and ends in the same State; (2) that is part of a voyage to another State or to a foreign country; and (3) in which the vessel reaches the other State or foreign country within three days after leaving the State in which it begins.

titles.title: To amend the Act commonly referred to as the "Johnson Act" to limit the authority of States to regulate gambling devices on vessels.
